Welcome!

I did a lot of things and plan to do some more.

I'm curious. I'm regulary asking myself what happens if we don't take the established status quo for granted. I believe in quality, not quantity.

I'm not trying to convince you about my point of view. It makes my day if something from my writing would resonate with you.

~ David
